name: ecr-login
postInstallNotes:
ECR login on DCOS successfully installed.
You can now begin pulling from this registry.
postUninstallNotes:
ECR login on DCOS successfully uninstalled.
.
preInstallNotes:
Pass the AWS account number and region as package options.
Make sure the Mesos agent's IAM role allows logging into the ECR specified.
Marathon will make sure that the ECR login agent runs only once per slave.
